item.title: How Well Has New Zealand Handled COVID-19?
item.description: At the beginning of March, I made the unfortunate decision of investing into two exchange-traded funds (ETFs) which were SmartShare’s FNZ (NZ Top 50) and USF (Fortune 500). It was unfortunate because the world decided to set itself on fire due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
